Package mks.myworkspace.crm.repository

Interface CustomerCareRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<mks.myworkspace.crm.entity.CustomerCare,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<mks.myworkspace.crm.entity.CustomerCare,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<mks.myworkspace.crm.entity.CustomerCare>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<mks.myworkspace.crm.entity.CustomerCare,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<mks.myworkspace.crm.entity.CustomerCare>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<mks.myworkspace.crm.entity.CustomerCare,​java.lang.Long>
    @Repository
public interface CustomerCareRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<mks.myworkspace.crm.entity.CustomerCare,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<mks.myworkspace.crm.entity.CustomerCare>
    Repository interface for managing CustomerCare entities.

    This repository and others repositories with name structure like: CustomerRepository, OrderStatusRepository, ... are just used for querying and managing data (SELECT)

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nguyen Hoang Phuong Ngan

    • Method Detail

      • findPotentialCustomers

        @Query("SELECT DISTINCT c FROM Customer c LEFT JOIN FETCH c.interactions i LEFT JOIN CustomerCare cc ON c.id = cc.customer.id WHERE (    c.mainStatus.name = \'M\u1edbi\' AND    (i.id IS NULL OR i.createdAt > cc.remindDate) AND    c.createdAt <= :caseDaysAgo_1 ) OR (    c.mainStatus.name = \'Ti\u1ec1m n\u0103ng\' AND    EXISTS (        SELECT 1 FROM Interaction i2        WHERE i2.customer.id = c.id        GROUP BY i2.customer.id        HAVING MAX(i2.createdAt) <= :caseDaysAgo_2    ) ) OR (   cc.remindDate IS NOT NULL )")
java.util.List<mks.myworkspace.crm.entity.Customer> findPotentialCustomers​(@Param("caseDaysAgo_1")
                                                                           java.time.LocalDateTime caseDaysAgo_1,
                                                                           @Param("caseDaysAgo_2")
                                                                           java.time.LocalDateTime caseDaysAgo_2)

      • findAllCustomerCares

        @Query("SELECT cc FROM CustomerCare cc JOIN FETCH cc.customer")
java.util.List<mks.myworkspace.crm.entity.CustomerCare> findAllCustomerCares()

      • existsInCustomerCares

        @Query("SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(c) > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END FROM CustomerCare c WHERE c.customer.id = :customerId AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CustomerCare cc WHERE cc.customer.id = c.customer.id)")
boolean existsInCustomerCares​(@Param("customerId")
                              java.lang.Long customerId)

      • existsByCustomeCareId

        @Query("SELECT COUNT(c) > 0 FROM CustomerCare c WHERE c.id = :customerCareId")
boolean existsByCustomeCareId​(@Param("customerCareId")
                              java.lang.Long customerCareId)
